name: ChromoMuncher
description:
Those marathon runners decided to cheat and run through abandoned building you live in. Eat them all! You just have to match their colors.

Controls:

Red Q/A
Green W/S
Blue E/D
Switch Lane Up/Down

Credits:

Mihailo Tatić - Art
Miloš Manojlović - Prog
Nikol Đorđević - Prog / Art
